last_episode_to_air.name: Driving Miss Garry
last_episode_to_air.overview: Guests Dan Aykroyd and Paul Winfield finish off the series.

name: It's Garry Shandling's Show
overview: It's Garry Shandling's Show is an American sitcom which was initially broadcast on Showtime from 1986 to 1990. It was created by Garry Shandling and Alan Zweibel. The show is notable for its frequent use of breaking the fourth wall to allow characters to speak directly to the audience. Its format inspired Sean Hughes to create Sean's Show in the UK.

episodes.name: The Day Garry Moved In
episodes.overview: Lovelorn Garry's new condo is robbed.

episodes.name: Grant Gets Broken
episodes.overview: Garry baby-sits Pete and Jackie's son, Grant.

episodes.name: Garry Throws a Surprise Party
episodes.overview: A birthday party nearly kills Garry's mother.

episodes.name: Foul Ball
episodes.overview:
Pete holds Grant's Cub Scout troop meeting @ Garry's house.  They invite Garry to their Cub Scout outing, the Dodgers playing the New York Mets.

At the ball game, Pete gets hit with a foul ball.  So they left early after the 7th inning.  When they arrived home, Grant turns on the sports report & the kids get angry because the Dodgers had a big bottom of the 9th to beat the Mets.  Garry was angry that he missed an usherette dancing topless on top of the Dodger dugout!  The Scouts razz Grant about his father's goof.

At the next Scout meeting, Garry invited a broadcaster to the meeting.  He shows the Scouts baseball greats make errors as well.  Grant forgives his dad.

episodes.name: The Graduate
episodes.overview: Garry is pursued by his mother's friend Mrs. Robinson.

episodes.name: It's Garry's Problem, But it's JoJo's Show
episodes.overview: Nancy's friend causes Garry to ignore the show's contest winner.

episodes.name: Garry Met a Girl Named Maria
episodes.overview: Garry weds Guatemalan Maria to save her from deportation.

episodes.overview: Grant's rebellious date falls for chaperon Garry.

episodes.name: Pete Has an Affair

episodes.overview: Everyone is angry at Garry about what happened at a party the night before. H uses his flash back machine to find out why.

episodes.name: Sarah
episodes.overview: Garry's ex-girlfriend wants a platonic relationship.

episodes.name: Laffie

episodes.name: Dial L for Laundry
episodes.overview: Garry meets Sylvia in the laundry.

episodes.name: Dinner with Garry
episodes.overview: Garry tries to fix his mother up with his   Internist.  The Shoemakers, Nancy, Garry, Garry's mother,   and the Doctor all go dancing.  After a little   production number on the floor, his mother indicates   she is having a wonderful time.  Three days later,   there hasn't been a call from the Doctor.  Garry goes   to the Doctor to find out why.  The Doctor indicates   he needs to wait a couple of years, to get over the   death of his wife.  We fast forward 2 years and the   Doctor is ready to date again.  The ballroom has   turned into a disco and fashions have changed to   turtle necks and bermuda shorts.  Big Grant shows up,   made that he's missed 2 years of baseball due to all   the fast forwarding.  But Grant is happy once he   finds out he is dating Mary Lou Retton.

episodes.name: Force Boxman
episodes.overview: Garry shows everyone the pilot for his new cop show.  Red Button takes over the show for Garry.

episodes.name: Who's Poppa?
episodes.overview: At Jackie's baby shower Pete questions whether he is the father.

episodes.name: No Baby, No Show
episodes.overview: The baby is born.

episodes.name: The Fugitive
episodes.overview: One of Garry's friends needs his help in running away from the law.  They both find out that the long arm of the law is longer then they originally thought.

episodes.name: The Schumakers go to Hollywood
episodes.overview:
After winning an essay contest about what Hollywood means to me, Grant & Pete win a trip to Hollywood (even though that's nearby Sherman Oaks).

They attend a taping of ""It's Garry Shandling's Show"".  Garry's in Grant's bedroom reading his secret poem to Lily.  Grant leaves the show embarrassed.

Pete & Garry find Grant @ the Hollywood sign saying they could help get his girl.  Garry removes the H-O in Holly & adds an I.  Then he drops the D in Wood leaving WOO (Grant's girl is Chinese) Lily Woo!  A song & dance number happens.

The show opened where the audeience had to sing the opening theme.  The audience had to dance in the closing credits.

episodes.name: Nancy Gets Amnesia
episodes.overview: Amnesiac Nancy develops a crush on Garry.

episodes.name: Anjelica (1)
episodes.overview: Gary appears on ""Love Connection"".  Host Chuck Woolery learns about Gary's date with Anjelica.  The audience voted right & the couple wins another date with Love Connection paying the tab.

episodes.name: Anjelica (2)
episodes.overview: The conclusion of the two part episode.  Garry's second date with Anjelica doesn't go as well as the first.  The two split.

episodes.overview: Garry has his first ever Christmas show with family and friends.

episodes.overview: Garry is missing.

episodes.name: Mr. Smith Goes to Nam
episodes.overview: Vet Leonard Smith has nightmares about Vietnam.

episodes.name: Goin' Places
episodes.overview: Travel agent Nancy mistakenly strands the Schumacher grandparents.

episodes.name: Pete's Got a Secret
episodes.overview: Pete announces something he has been hiding for years.  The truth shocks everybody.

episodes.name: What's Happening to Me?
episodes.overview:
Mayor Tom Bradley is in the audience, but he only likes musicals.  So this is a special musical episode with musical numbers, complete with a pianist & singing plumbers!  Everyone sings a number, including Garry (a little).

Pete & Jackie worry that their son, Grant, is going through a stage.  Grant is in love with a girl named Madeline.  She wants him to study human anatomy with her.

Garry gives Grant advice that it's OK to wait to have sex later.  So Madeline & Grant agree to wait a while.  At the near end, Mayor Bradley proclaims ""Grant Schumaker Day"" & no school.

The show ends in a hoe-down.

episodes.name: Live Election Show
episodes.overview: The election affects life in Sherman Oaks.
